item.title: Privacy Policy - SG BusNow!
item.description:
Privacy Policy / éšç§æ”¿ç­–

Last Updated: December 2025

æœ€åæ›´æ–°ï¼š2025å¹´12æœˆ

English Version

Introduction

SG BusNow! (“we”, “our”, or “the App”) is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application.

Information We Collect

1. Location Information

  • When Collected: Only when you actively use features that require location (e.g., finding nearby stops, trip tracking)
  • Purpose: To show nearby bus stops/MRT stations and provide real-time trip tracking
  • Storage: Location data is processed locally on your device and is not stored on our servers
  • Background Location: Used only during active trip tracking to provide arrival notifications. You can disable this in Settings.

2. Usage Data

  • What We Collect: App interactions, feature usage patterns, crash reports
  • Purpose: To improve app performance and user experience
  • Third-Party Analytics: We use Google AdMob which may collect anonymous usage data

3. Saved Preferences

  • What We Collect: Favorite stops, saved routes, language preferences, theme settings
  • Storage: Stored locally on your device only
  • Sync: This data is not synced to any cloud service

Third-Party Services

Google AdMob

We use Google AdMob to display advertisements. AdMob may collect:

item.title: SG BusNow! One page
item.description:
Singapore’s Smartest Public Transport Companion

ğŸ¯ The Problem We Solve

Every Day in Singapore, Commuters Face These Challenges:

“Will I miss my stop?”
Unlike MRT trains, Singapore buses don’t announce stops. Foreign tourists and even locals often miss their destination, especially on unfamiliar routes.

“When will my bus actually arrive?”
Bus stop displays show estimated times, but they’re not always accurate. Commuters waste time waiting or rush unnecessarily.

“How do I get there?”
Planning trips across multiple transport modes (bus + MRT + walking) is complex. Most apps only show one mode at a time.
